monogr.author: Hyperides
monogr.title:
Minor Attic Orators in two volumes, 2, with an English translation by
                            J. O. Burtt, M.A.

imprint.publisher:
Cambridge, MA, Harvard University Press; London, William
                                Heinemann Ltd.

change.item: Change markup in accordance with orator dtd

when importing, did lots of changes. Restored is now square brackets, like
                    Bacchyl. gap is note type="text" and columns is note type="papyr". Also fixed
                    SGML errors. and added spaces around notes. fixed some beta errors.

note.#text:
Desunt col. 41 versus fere viginti
                        unus et col. 42 fere tota.

Desunt col. 43 versus fere quindecim et col. 44 versus fere
                        decem.

Hoc
                        fragmentum a Polluce (9. 156) servatum huc inseruit Blass.

add. Babington, quod
                        dubium an A supra versum habeat.

                    diale/gesqai. t[i/nos] ga\r e(/neken; [ti/ pro\s] au)to\n t[au/tas]
                    dienex[qh=nai e)/dei], o(\n filo[frone/steron] dh\ th=s
                    [despoi/nhs] prosfe[rome/nhs au)]tw=|
                     ti/sin ou)=n
                    tekm[h]ri/ois xrhsa/me[nos] tou/tous keleu/[ei] katadika/zein; x[rh=]t[a]i nh\
                    *di/a, tai=[s tw=n] khdestw=n m[artu]ri/ais *)anasxe/t[ou] kai\ *qeomnh/st[ou
                    kai\] *kri/twnos, a(\s kalw=s e)/xon e)sti/n, w)= a)/[n]dres dikastai/, m[h\]
                    pare/r[gws] e)cet[a/s]ai. th\n [ga\]r o(/lh[n ka]thgori/[an] e)k 
                     [t]w=| *xa[ri/p]pw| th\n [a)]delfh\[n e]i)s [*)o]lu[mpi/an]
                    a)podhmh=sa[i] to\n *d[i]w/cipp[o]n stefanw/s[o]nta th\n po/lin. *luko/frona de\
                    te/ws me\n pe/mponta
                    e)pis[tola\]s le/gein
